Description: Limestone ostracon bearing Coptic. Contains a prayer, 'Prayer of inclination before communion'.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Henri Édouard Naville (1893-94, on behalf of EEF)
Curator's comments: In the same hand as O.Crum 4 & 7. Studied with a view to publication by Mihálykó, 2021.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (390704) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/390704)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Crum 6 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
